titleStmt.title: The seconde [seventh] sermon of Maister Hughe Latimer which he preached before the Kynges Maiestie [with?]in his graces palayce at Westminster, ye xv. day of Marche [-xix daye of Apryll], M.ccccc.xlix.
titleStmt.author: Latimer, Hugh, 1485?-1555.

titleStmt.title: The seconde [seventh] sermon of Maister Hughe Latimer which he preached before the Kynges Maiestie [with?]in his graces palayce at Westminster, ye xv. day of Marche [-xix daye of Apryll], M.ccccc.xlix.
titleStmt.author: Latimer, Hugh, 1485?-1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Jhon Day, dwellynge at Aldersgate, and Wylliam Seres, dwellyng in Peter Colledge ... to be solde at the new shop by the [sp--e?] Conduyte in Chepesyde,

notesStmt.note: Title page printed within ornamental border.
Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Title has "Maister Hughe Latimer"; F₁v note ends "sed worthely"; "Cum gratia ..." below t.p. border.
"Cum gratia et Priuilegio ab imprimendum solum."
Imperfect: print show-through and broken type, with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
